label: Effect / Chats Emoji Button Glyph Filter
Chats / Send Button Background
Shadow / Chip Active

inset 0 1px 0 rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.18),
      0 10px 20px color-mix(in srgb, var(--color-brand) 18%, rgba(5, 10, 30, 0.2))

label: Composer / Footer Background
Composer / Main Column Background
fallback:
linear-gradient(
      180deg,
      color-mix(in srgb, var(--surface-elevated, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.92)) 94%, transparent),
      color-mix(in srgb, var(--surface-app, #f7f9ff) 88%, transparent)
    )

Composer Quick Chip Bg

    color-mix(in srgb, var(--composer-rail-background) 82%, transparent),
    color-mix(in srgb, var(--composer-panel-background) 88%, transparent)
  )

"Clash Display", "Inter", "SF Pro Display", -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI",
      sans-serif

"JetBrains Mono", "Fira Code", ui-monospace, SFMono-Regular, Menlo, Monaco, Consolas,
      "Liberation Mono", "Courier New", monospace

label: Surface / Header Button Background

linear-gradient(
    180deg,
    color-mix(in srgb, var(--surface-elevated) 96%, var(--header-brand) 4%),
    color-mix(in srgb, var(--surface-muted) 94%, var(--header-brand-strong) 6%)
  )

label: Surface / Header Button Hover Background

linear-gradient(
    180deg,
    color-mix(in srgb, var(--surface-elevated) 92%, var(--header-brand) 8%),
    color-mix(in srgb, var(--surface-muted) 90%, var(--header-brand-strong) 10%)
  )

label: Live Stage Message Highlight
Party / Status Pill Background
Party / Status Pill Border
Prompter / Prompt Bar Glow
fallback:
radial-gradient(120% 160% at 10% 50%, rgba(99, 102, 241, 0.3), transparent 65%),
      radial-gradient(120% 160% at 90% 50%, rgba(124, 58, 237, 0.26), transparent 65%),
      radial-gradient(160% 160% at 50% 50%, rgba(56, 189, 248, 0.2), transparent 70%)
lightFallback:
radial-gradient(
        120% 160% at 10% 50%,
        color-mix(in srgb, var(--color-brand) 35%, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.75)),
        transparent 65%
      ),
      radial-gradient(
        120% 160% at 90% 50%,
        color-mix(in srgb, var(--color-accent) 28%, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.75)),
        transparent 65%
      ),
      radial-gradient(
        160% 160% at 50% 50%,
        color-mix(in srgb, var(--color-info) 24%, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.75)),
        transparent 70%
      )
